snippet: President Obama’s program to suspend deportation of young immigrants comes with a daunting paperwork challenge, but progress is being made.
abstract: Editorial credits Citizenship and Immigration Services agency for posting detailed guidance online for young immigrants who need to prove they arrived in the United States before turning 16, one of the requirements needed for deferral from deportation; notes Pres Obama's decision to suspend these deportations has stirred hope and exhilaration, as well as a daunting paperwork challenge.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s program to suspend deportation of young immigrants comes with a daunting paperwork challenge, but progress is being made.
